com.ibm.watson.dsm.util

Class HostAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.util.HostAddress

  • public class HostAddress
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides flexibility in how the hostname of a platform is determeined.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalIPAddress

        public static java.lang.String getLocalIPAddress()
                                          throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Get the name of the local host, with many options defined in DSM properties. If "networking.hostip.plugin.class" properties is set, then expect it to have a static method named "getIPAddress" and call it to get the name of the host. If not set, then look for the "networking.hostip.value" to provide the value. If that is not set, then look for the "networking.hostip.nic" property value and get the ip address of the named network interface card. If none of these properties are set, then use InetAddress.getLocalHost().
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException

      • getIPAddressInternal

        protected static java.lang.String getIPAddressInternal()
                                                throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Get the IPV4 address to use to receive messages on.
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
